context_bundle.summary: 4 MCPs depend on X: drive (F:\\CARBYNE.vhdx): git-mcp-rs, multiplexor-mcp-rs, sigcon6-rs, carbyne-bridge. If X: not mounted, they fail silently.

onboarding.quick_start: If git/mux/sigcon/carbyne fail: 1. Test-Path X:\\mcp-servers. 2. If false: diskpart select vdisk F:\\CARBYNE.vhdx, attach, assign letter=X. 3. Restart Claude Desktop. 4. Verify all 4 MCPs respond.
common_patterns: Check X: mounted before assuming MCP failure
Mount via diskpart: select vdisk file=F:\CARBYNE.vhdx; attach vdisk
Restart Claude Desktop after mount to respawn MCPs
known_errors: git:git_* fails silently when X: not mounted
multiplexor, sigcon6, carbyne-bridge all on X:
MCPs don't auto-respawn - requires Claude Desktop restart
Volume may mount as G: instead of X: - use diskpart assign letter=X
